title: Looking for an RG ligature
content:
This might be a long-shot but I'm looking for a rather elegant serif that includes an RG-ligature. Where the R encapsules a smaller G. I have this feeling I have seen this somewhere, but i don't know where. Here's a quick mock up to illustrate what I mean:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417073909im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lig_4853.jpg)
author: Thord

comments.content:
Maybe draw it yourself?  
With the leg of the 'R' there are some possibilities.
Thank you both. Mantinia might work. I see it has an alternative R that could fit well.
